body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Albert Young and the customer's name is Ann Howard.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Albert Young, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Albert, nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too, Ann! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking to buy a new motorcycle, but I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Ann. Buying a motorcycle is a big decision. Can I ask you a couple of questions to help narrow down your options?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! First, could you please provide me your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's two zero three one seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you tell me your age?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! That gives me a better idea of what might suit you. Thank you for your time, Ann. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you, Albert!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Ann! Have a great day, and we look forward to helping you find the perfect motorcycle soon!
